description:
Solve the **Graph Valid Tree** problem.

Given n nodes labeled 0 to n-1 and a list of undirected edges, determine if the edges form a valid tree. A valid tree must be connected and acyclic (exactly n-1 edges).

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/graph-valid-tree/).
